p: Two-thirds of the respondents were male (66.7%) and most (81.8%) were younger than 54 years of age (Table 2). EHPs in management positions comprised two-thirds of the respondents. Average age of EHPs was 45.2 years (range = 25–60) and two-thirds of the respondents were male (66.7%). Respondents with less than 5 years of EHP work experience and those who had between 5 and 10 years’ experience were equally 40.9%. Most respondents were resident in the city of Cape Town or Western Cape Province. EHPs education level ranged from national diploma to a doctorate with most (45.5%) EHPs having completed a bachelor’s degree.
